panels.visual: Starlight Mephit attacking Cone of radiance hitting Prismor **Sound EFFECTS:** "WHOOOM" **Caption:** "PRISMOR: SAVE SUCCESS - 3 DAMAGE, DOWN TO 6 HP!"
Lord Alric preparing another spell Looking confident
panels.dialogue: Alric: "You're finished! The Dawn's Crown is MINE!"

panels.visual: Verdant Mephit (from earlier failed check) appearing Attacking Alric from behind Made of vines and thorns **Sound EFFECTS:** "WHIP-SLASH!"
Verdant Mephit's thorn attack hitting Alric **Caption:** "8 DAMAGE TO ALRIC!"
